An epidemic of the bubonic plague spread to your village. The population suffered heavy losses.
A mild drought caused crops to perform poorly this month. Your village\'s farms took a little damage.
A blight of locusts invaded your village and ate through your crops! Your village\'s farms experienced significant difficulty.
A powerful storm washed away valuable farmland and equipment. Your village\'s farms took moderate damage.
Your village was attacked by dragons! Your village\'s farms suffered significant losses.
A wildfire burned through your crops. Your village\'s farms took heavy damage.
A freakishly large and ferocious bear has rampaged through the village. Your fortifications took a little damage.
Bandits have raided your village and stolen valuable weapons. Your fortifications have been significantly weakened.
A tribe of barbarians has attacked your village. No lives were lost, but your fortifications took moderate damage.
Your people favor Pacifism. Your fortifications have suffered significant losses.
A neighboring kingdom has attacked your village. You\'ve fended off the enemy, but your village\'s fortifications have been heavily damaged.
Heavy rain has caused massive flooding throughout the village. Your houses took a little damage.
A lightening strike to a thatched roof caused a fire to break out. Your houses took significant damage.
The housing bubble burst. Families now face foreclosure and demolition of their homes. Your houses have taken moderate damage.
Your village has a growing termite infestation. Your houses have been greatly damaged.
A pack of giants has trampled through your village. Your houses have been heavily damaged.
